mapper.insert: insert into noticeboard(notice_title, notice_con, admin_id, store_id) values (#{notice_title}, #{notice_con}, #{admin_id}, #{store_id})
mapper.select: select * from noticeboard order by notice_id desc limit #{firstRow}, 10
mapper.update: update noticeboard set notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_con=#{notice_con} where notice_id=#{notice_id};
